DataElement.preferredName: Screening Informed Consent Responsible Person Discussion Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of screening consent form discussion by a person worthy of responsibility, trust, or held accountable.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Screening Informed Consent Responsible Person Discussion
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved._A person worthy of responsibility or trust or one held accountable._An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic._A systematic examination or assessment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A systematic examination or assessment.:Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

Concepts.definition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

Property.preferredDefinition: A person worthy of responsibility or trust or one held accountable.:An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.

Concepts.definition: A person worthy of responsibility or trust or one held accountable.
An extended communication (often interactive) dealing with some particular topic.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
